title: DataLoader workers initialize CUDA
body_html:
Really weird one, for some reason workers initialize CUDA even if it's not used anywhere. What I tried:

  1. Removing CUDA calls from main(), CUDA is still initialized
  2. Removing DataLoader and simply iterating over the dataset: CUDA is not initialized (!)

It's quite annoying because e.g. 8 workers use 108*8 Mb of GPU RAM.

Temporary solution:

os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = opt.gpu_id
torch.randn(8).cuda()
os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = ''

Happens with python 2.7, opencv in torchvision
